verses.verse: And it came <WH1961> about in the twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> year, <WH8141> in the twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> [month, <WH2320>] on the first <WH259> of the month, that the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came <WH1961> to me saying, <WH559>

"Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> take <WH5375> up a lamentation <WH7015> over <WH5921> Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt, <WH4714> and say <WH559> to him, 'You compared <WH1819> yourself to a young <WH3715> lion <WH3715> of the nations, <WH1471> Yet you are like the monster <WH8577> in the seas; <WH3220> And you burst <WH1518> forth <WH1518> in your rivers, <WH5104> And muddied <WH1804> the waters <WH4325> with your feet, <WH7272> And fouled <WH7511> their rivers. <WH5104>'"

Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God, <WH3068> "Now I will spread <WH6566> My net <WH7568> over <WH5921> you With a company <WH6951> of many <WH7227> peoples, <WH5971> And they shall lift <WH5927> you up in My net. <WH2764>

"And I will leave <WH5203> you on the land; <WH776> I will cast <WH2904> you on the open <WH6440> field. <WH7704> And I will cause all <WH3605> the birds <WH5775> of the heavens <WH8064> to dwell <WH7931> on you, And I will satisfy <WH7646> the beasts <WH9130> of the whole <WH3605> earth <WH776> with you.
"And I will lay <WH5414> your flesh <WH1320> on the mountains, <WH2022> And fill <WH4390> the valleys <WH1516> with your refuse. <WH7419>
"I will also make the land <WH776> drink <WH8248> the discharge <WH6824> of your blood, <WH1818> As far <WH413> as the mountains, <WH2022> And the ravines <WH650> shall be full <WH4390> of you.

"And when [I] extinguish <WH3518> you, I will cover <WH3680> the heavens, <WH8064> and darken <WH6937> their stars; <WH3556> I will cover <WH3680> the sun <WH8121> with a cloud, <WH6051> And the moon <WH3394> shall not give <WH215> its light. <WH216>

"All <WH3605> the shining <WH3974> lights <WH216> in the heavens <WH8064> I will darken <WH6937> over <WH5921> you And will set <WH5414> darkness <WH2822> on your land, <WH776>" Declares <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God. <WH3068>

"I will also trouble <WH3707> the hearts <WH3820> of many <WH7227> peoples, <WH5971> when I bring <WH935> your destruction <WH7667> among the nations, <WH1471> into lands <WH776> which <WH834> you have not known. <WH3045>

"And I will make <WH8074> many <WH7227> peoples <WH5971> appalled <WH8074> at you, and their kings <WH4428> shall be horribly <WH9623> afraid <WH8175> of you when I brandish <WH5774> My sword <WH2719> before <WH5921> <WH6440> them; and they shall tremble <WH2729> every moment, <WH7281> every <WH376> man <WH376> for his own life, <WH5315> on the day <WH3117> of your fall. <WH4658>"
For thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God, <WH3068> "The sword <WH2719> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> shall come <WH935> upon you.

"By the swords <WH2719> of the mighty <WH1368> ones <WH1368> I will cause your multitude <WH1995> to fall; <WH5307> all <WH3605> of them are tyrants <WH6184> of the nations, <WH1471> And they shall devastate <WH7703> the pride <WH1347> of Egypt, <WH4714> And all <WH3605> its multitude <WH1995> shall be destroyed. <WH8045>

"I will also destroy all <WH6> its cattle <WH3605> from beside <WH929> many <WH5921> waters; <WH7227> And the foot <WH4325> of man <WH7272> shall not muddy <WH120> them anymore, <WH1804> And the hoofs <WH5750> of beasts <WH6541> shall not muddy <WH929> them.
"Then <WH227> I will make their waters <WH4325> settle, <WH8257> And will cause their rivers <WH5104> to run <WH1980> like oil, <WH8081>" Declares <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God. <WH3068>

"When I make <WH5414> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> a desolation, <WH8077> And the land <WH776> is destitute <WH8074> of that which <WH4393> filled <WH4393> it, When I smite <WH5221> all <WH3605> those who live <WH3427> in it, Then they shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord. <WH3068>

"This <WH1931> is a lamentation <WH7015> and they shall chant <WH6969> it. The daughters <WH1323> of the nations <WH1471> shall chant <WH6969> it. Over <WH5921> Egypt <WH4714> and over <WH5921> all <WH3605> her multitude <WH1995> they shall chant <WH6969> it," declares <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God. <WH3068>

And it came <WH1961> about in the twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> year, <WH8141> on the fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> of the month, <WH2320> that the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came <WH1961> to me saying, <WH559>

"Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> wail <WH5091> for the multitude <WH1995> of Egypt, <WH4714> and bring <WH3381> it down, <WH3381> her and the daughters <WH1323> of the powerful <WH117> nations, <WH1471> to the nether <WH8482> world, <WH776> with those who go <WH3381> down <WH3381> to the pit; <WH953>
'Whom <WH4310> do you surpass <WH5276> in beauty <WH5276>? Go <WH3381> down <WH3381> and make <WH7901> your bed <WH7901> with the uncircumcised. <WH6189>'

"They shall fall <WH5307> in the midst <WH8432> of those who are slain <WH2491> by the sword. <WH2719> She is given <WH5414> over to the sword; <WH2719> they have drawn <WH4900> her and all <WH3605> her multitudes <WH1995> away. <WH4900>

"The strong <WH410> among the mighty <WH1368> ones <WH1368> shall speak <WH1696> of him [and] his helpers <WH1368> from the midst <WH8432> of Sheol, <WH7585> 'They have gone <WH3381> down, <WH3381> they lie <WH7901> still, <WH7901> the uncircumcised, <WH6189> slain <WH2491> by the sword. <WH2719>'

"Assyria <WH804> is there <WH8033> and all <WH3605> her company; <WH6951> her graves <WH6913> are round <WH5439> about <WH5439> her. All <WH3605> of them are slain, <WH2491> fallen <WH5307> by the sword, <WH2719>

whose <WH834> graves <WH6913> are set <WH5414> in the remotest <WH3411> parts <WH3411> of the pit, <WH953> and her company <WH6951> is round <WH5439> about <WH5439> her grave. <WH6900> All <WH3605> of them are slain, <WH2491> fallen <WH5307> by the sword, <WH2719> who <WH834> spread <WH5414> terror <WH2851> in the land <WH776> of the living. <WH2416>

"Elam <WH5867> is there <WH8033> and all <WH3605> her multitude <WH1995> around <WH5439> her grave; <WH6900> all <WH3605> of them slain, <WH2491> fallen <WH5307> by the sword, <WH2719> who <WH834> went <WH3381> down <WH3381> uncircumcised <WH6189> to the lower <WH8482> parts <WH8482> of the earth, <WH776> who <WH834> instilled <WH5414> their terror <WH2851> in the land <WH776> of the living, <WH2416> and bore <WH5375> their disgrace <WH3639> with those who went <WH3381> down <WH3381> to the pit. <WH953>

"They have made <WH5414> a bed <WH4904> for her among <WH8432> the slain <WH2491> with all <WH3605> her multitude. <WH1995> Her graves <WH6913> are around <WH5439> it, they are all <WH3605> uncircumcised, <WH6189> slain <WH2491> by the sword <WH2719> (although <WH3588> their terror <WH2851> was instilled <WH5414> in the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>), and they bore <WH5375> their disgrace <WH3639> with those who go <WH3381> down <WH3381> to the pit; <WH953> they were put <WH5414> in the midst <WH8432> of the slain. <WH2491>

"Meshech, <WH4902> Tubal <WH8422> and all <WH3605> their multitude <WH1995> are there; <WH8033> their graves <WH6913> surround <WH5439> them. All <WH3605> of them were slain <WH9135> by the sword <WH2719> uncircumcised, <WH6189> though <WH3588> they instilled <WH5414> their terror <WH2851> in the land <WH776> of the living. <WH2416>

"Nor <WH3808> do they lie <WH7901> beside <WH854> the fallen <WH5307> heroes <WH1368> of the uncircumcised, <WH6189> who <WH834> went <WH3381> down <WH3381> to Sheol <WH7585> with their weapons <WH3627> of war, <WH4421> and whose swords <WH2719> were laid <WH5414> under <WH8478> their heads; <WH7218> but the punishment <WH5771> for their iniquity <WH5771> rested <WH1961> on their bones, <WH6106> though <WH3588> the terror <WH2851> of [these] heroes <WH1368> [was] once in the land <WH776> of the living. <WH2416>
"But in the midst <WH8432> of the uncircumcised <WH6189> you will be broken <WH7665> and lie <WH7901> with those slain <WH2491> by the sword. <WH2719>

"There <WH8033> also is Edom, <WH9000> its kings, <WH4428> and all <WH3605> its princes, <WH5387> who <WH834> for [all] their might <WH1369> are laid <WH5414> with those slain <WH2491> by the sword; <WH2719> they will lie <WH7901> with the uncircumcised, <WH6189> and with those who go <WH3381> down <WH3381> to the pit. <WH953>

"There <WH8033> also are the chiefs <WH5257> of the north, <WH6828> all <WH3605> of them, and all <WH3605> the Sidonians, <WH6722> who <WH834> in spite of the terror <WH2851> resulting from their might, <WH1369> in shame <WH954> went <WH3381> down <WH3381> with the slain. <WH2491> So they lay <WH7901> down <WH7901> uncircumcised <WH6189> with those slain <WH2491> by the sword, <WH2719> and bore <WH5375> their disgrace <WH3639> with those who go <WH3381> down <WH3381> to the pit. <WH953>

"These Pharaoh <WH6547> will see, <WH7200> and he will be comforted <WH5162> for all <WH3605> his multitude <WH1995> slain <WH2491> by the sword, <WH2719> [even] Pharaoh <WH6547> and all <WH3605> his army, <WH2428>" declares <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God. <WH3068>

"Though <WH3588> I instilled <WH5414> a terror <WH2851> of him in the land <WH776> of the living, <WH2416> yet he will be made to lie <WH7901> down <WH7901> among <WH8432> [the] uncircumcised <WH6189> [along] with those slain <WH2491> by the sword, <WH2719> [even] Pharaoh <WH6547> and all <WH3605> his multitude, <WH1995>" declares <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God. <WH3068>
